DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety tolerability daily dose regimen SHP626 overweight obese adult .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Tolerability Study SHP626 Overweight Obese Adults
DOC.criteria: Males comply applicable contraceptive requirement female nonchildbearing potential No history active chronic disease allow study ( hypertension , hyperlipidemia gastroesophageal reflux disease ( GERD ) heartburn ) Has body mass index 2535 kg/m2 body weight great 140lbs ( assessed screening ) No history alcohol substance abuse , include use tobacco No substantial change eat habit exercise routine .
